US Must Balance International and Domestic Energy Policy Like it?   The following is one of two cross-posted contributions from ITIF to National Journal . Job growth in clean energy is a tricky subject. As Brookings found, green sector employment has increased substantially in recent years, and this trend is to be applauded. But a key economic challenge is to make sure that we aren’t just swapping green jobs for fossil energy jobs, and are actually achieving net job growth.
